tutorial.text: Welcome to the tutorial! Press enter to continue.
After a line of text appears, press enter to see the next line.
Sometimes, you will have to make a choice. Type in an answer, then press enter.
If you type "stats" or "menu", you can see your stats or go to the main menu.
Be aware that if you go back to the main menu, you will lose all your progress!

intro.text: It is another beautiful, exciting day. You are once again teaching a class of wonderful students.
You are absolutely delighted to see that only half of your enrolled students have once again deigned to grace you with their presence.
You put this fact behind you, and continue your lecture, but something is nagging at the back of your mind....
Oh no! You've made a terrible mistake! Your stove is still on at home! With this at the forefront of your mind, you attempt to skillfully escape your classroom.
Suddenly, an explosion rings out! You lose track of yourself and where you are, discombobulated by the magnitude of the force.
You struggle to maintain your focus, as your vision becomes a dark, closing tunnel....
The next moment, you feel a damp substance under your hands.
You open your eyes, and see that you have fallen face first onto a muddy patch of grass.
What an unfortunate circumstance to be in! Thank goodness no one is around to see this...
??? - What a terrible state I find thee in, traveler from a strange land. Tell me then, wherefore you hail from, and what led thee to such an appearance?
You do not know what to say of the current circumstances, but circumstance requires your answer. What led to this issue:
??? - Thy story falls well on my ear traveler, yet I can not say that I understand what it is you mean. No matter, I too am astounded by fate...
??? - Let me tell of you my circumstances, so that we may share a bond in our company. I hail from Thessaly, and I...
??? - ...Delphi, and we made haste away from...
??? - ... when suddenly, we were onset by pirates. I fought valiantly...
You begin to get exhausted. How can he possibly have so much to say? After a seeming eternity...
??? - And that concludes the circumstances of my arrival to this strange dwelling place. Ah, my name is Theagenes. Forgive my negligence in offering thee my name.
Now things are starting to make sense.
NO they are NOT. Wasn't this the protagonist of An Ethiopian Romance? What the devil is he doing here, enjoying your muddied look while giving such long exposition....
You decide to give him a piece of your mind, but suddenly, you both notice movement around you!
Two hands rise out of the mud!! Then another two!
Do you [run], [kick] them, or do [nothing]?
What is your name?
Fight or die?

intro_run.text: You run as quickly as possible, but the uneven terrain gets the best of you. You fall face first into the mud again.
Did you deserve this? Is this just fate? Is this just fortune? Which is it??
While you fall into deep confusion, Theagenes has bared his knuckles for a fight.
The hands push themselves out of the ground, revealing two bodies!
One of them pulls themselves out, caked in mud. They seem to be wearing a dirty eyepatch, and they appear confused at Theagenes.
??? - That's the last time I'm wearing a f***ing eyepatch, this doesn't just happen.
Theagenes - What manner of spirit are thee you evil abomination? Speak now so that thee's soul can rest eternally....
At that very moment, the other body launches itself out at an absurd velocity. They appear to be wearing a set of plate armor....
Plate armor man - Now now Sir,

You continue onto your next journey.
